title: Lego Marvels Avengers PS3
description:
Game overview

Avengers Assemble! The best-selling LEGO Marvel videogame franchise returns with a new action-packed, Super Hero adventure. Join the LEGO Marvelâ€™s Avengers team and experience the first console videogame featuring characters and storylines from the critically-acclaimed film Marvelâ€™s The Avengers, the blockbuster sequel Marvelâ€™s Avengers: Age of Ultron, and more.
